Question
========
Which of the following situations describes a problem that could be tested with an analysis of variance (ANOVA)?

Answerlist
----------
* Compare the proportion of patients who overcome their fear of failure for three different therapies. Each therapy is applied to a sample of 45 patients.
* Analyze the relationship between average grade at VWO and average grade at HBO.
* Compare the average birth weight for babies of mothers from three different countries of birth (Netherlands, Morocco, Turkey).
* Analyze the relationship between gender and opinion on the death penalty (agree/disagree).
